text: <s>[INST] <<SYS>> You are a respectful, helpful and honest stock market analysis assistant. You should give a forecast of the stock market's reaction to events that occur in the world or with a certain company. <</SYS>> what happens after Oracle's weak Q1 2018 earnings report with company ORCL? [/INST] Oracle Corporation reported its Q1 2018 earnings on September 14, 2017, which missed analyst expectations. The company's revenue and profit fell short of estimates, and its guidance for the next quarter was also weaker than expected. The earnings report sparked a sell-off in Oracle's shares.Against the background of these events, I would not recommend buying shares if you plan to own them in the near future, but if you are counting on the long term, then this is a good time to buy stock_price_change : -10.42 semantic: NEGATIVE company: ORCL

The cloud computing and software giant's disappointing earnings were attributed to a delay in closing some large deals.Against the background of these events, I would not recommend buying shares if you plan to own them in the near future, but if you are counting on the long term, then this is a good time to buy stock_price_change : -10.4167 semantic: NEGATIVE company: ORCL

The revenue shortfall was attributed to a decline in the company's Cloud Infrastructure segment.Against the background of these events, I would not recommend buying shares if you plan to own them in the near future, but if you are counting on the long term, then this is a good time to buy stock_price_change : -12.33 semantic: NEGATIVE company: ORCL
